subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Yankees completed a $12 million deal with Andy Pettitte, who said he had not decided whether this coming season, his 18th in the majors, would be his final one.
snippet: The Yankees completed a $12 million deal with Andy Pettitte, who said he had not decided whether this coming season, his 18th in the majors, would be his final one.
